        private javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<?,?> findColumn(java.lang.String name)
        Finds a column with the given name. If no such column exists, returns null
        Parameters:
        name - The desired name
        Returns:
        TableColumn the colummn if it exists, or null if it does not.

      • findSubColumn

        private javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<?,?> findSubColumn(javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<?,?> col,
                                                            java.lang.String name)
        Finds a column with the given name under the given column. If no such column exists, returns null
        Parameters:
        name - The desired name
        Returns:
        TableColumn the colummn if it exists, or null if it does not.

      • checkChildren

        private boolean checkChildren(javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<?,?> col,
                              java.lang.String name)
        Checks if a column exists with the given name as a child of a column. Checks recursively.
        Parameters:
        col - The column being checked
        name - The name beign searched for
        Returns:
        boolean true if a column exists with the given name in any child column
